channel.title: Smart Home Circle
channel.description: A comprehensive resource covering Smart Home Tech, detailed Single Board Computers (SBC) reviews, mini PC, Home Automation, HomeLab upgrades, and Home Assistant guides.

item.title: Radxa Cubie A5E Hands-On: The Budget NVMe SBC—Full Review & Results
item.description: Radxa Cubie A5E tested—performance, temps, NVMe speeds, and value vs Raspberry Pi, with real numbers and use-cases
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: I Built A DIY 10 Inch Server Rack
item.description: DIY 10-inch rack using 2020 aluminium profiles—ideal for SBCs and home labs. Includes 3D print files and full build guide.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Radxa X4L: A Pocket-Sized Powerhouse
item.description: A powerful pocket-sized PC featuring the Intel N100 processor, dual 32-bit LPDDR5 memory channels, and versatile OS support. Ideal for home automation, virtualization, and portable computing.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: 3 Backup Strategies for My Raspberry Pi 5 NAS with RAID 5
item.description: Unleash Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5: compact, versatile mini-computer for high-speed storage, DIY NAS, and innovative projects.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Radxa X4: 60$ Powerful Atlernative to Raspberry Pi 5
item.description: Radxa X4, A New Intel-Based Single Board Computer: Features, Performance, and Use Cases
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)
